entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SPRINKLES IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

WIDESPREAD FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST THROUGH THE DAY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
